text: 1:24-25 Akar Mogomem 1:4-15; 19:6Egha da mɨgha zuima, kɨ dar avɨzibar nɨgɨnim barazima, mati ongarim dɨpɨra tɨngazi, egha mati mɨdorozir gumazir okuruar gavgavir mam mɨsoghasa zui, egha mati Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itimɨn tiarim, ararimɨn mɨn dagarvasi. Egha da mɨghegha ghua tuivigha, uan avɨzibar kumi.
